001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.builders;
002
003import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.PumpStateSupplier;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.KnownApiVersion;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.PairingCodeType;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.authentication.CentralChallengeRequest;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.authentication.AbstractCentralChallengeRequest;
009
010public class CentralChallengeRequestBuilder {
011    public static AbstractCentralChallengeRequest create(int appInstanceId) {
012        if (PumpStateSupplier.pumpApiVersion.get().greaterThan(KnownApiVersion.API_V3)) {
013            return null; // Handled inside pair()
014        } else {
015            return createV1(appInstanceId);
016        }
017    }
018
019    private static AbstractCentralChallengeRequest createV1(int appInstanceId) {
020        // TODO: this should be 8 instead of 10, we cut off 2 bytes at the end for no reason
021        byte[] centralChallenge = Bytes.getSecureRandom10Bytes();
022        return new CentralChallengeRequest(appInstanceId, centralChallenge);
023    }
024}
